website_summaries.verdict: Popular hard hat offered in a dozen colors. Full brim style provides protection from sun.
pros: Size of hat is easy to adjust, even while wearing it
Lightweight, yet provides the protection you need
cons: May feel too lightweight for some wearers to think they can trust it for safety

customer_reviews.title: It held up to my mother-in-law!
customer_reviews.text: This hard hat is amazing. It’s lightweight and looks great on me. I can’t speak for everyone, but I look good in it. I always gets compliments. I was helping my mother-in-law put up the Christmas lights yesterday and she fell on me. Luckily I was wearing this hard hat! I was OK, but she suffered a ruptured spleen. She weighs about 230lbs. The primary use for this hard hat is work! Hopefully I will never need to test it’s quality at work, although with what happened with my mother-in-law left me feeling confident in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marwin_D

customer_reviews.title: Started melting in hot temps.
customer_reviews.text: Although comfortable, the coating or paint or whatever is making the design on the outside of the helmet can not withstand any kind of heat. I live in Northern California and work as a Forester and in temps of around 95-100 degrees outside the outer layer of this helmet started melting. Could be the paint or it could be the helmet. Either way it leaves a sticky melted residue that gets all over everything. Hopefully this isn’t messing with the structure of the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Short

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it's not great with long hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like how lightweight the material is, though I really wish it were long hair friendly. I had to put tape on some parts of the band, and the swivel often pulls my hair out as it gets stuck in it. Otherwise, it sits low on my head and it stays in place in high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Natticate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Packaging was excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Packaging was excellent. Very lightweight compared to other models of hard hat that I've owned. The finish is clean and professional. Excellent communication from seller as well, making sure if I was satisfied with the product. Customer service A+.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the price and lightweight design!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very light and durable..made in 2017 in December so it is good for many years. Not a glossy as the picture but that's ok. Very easy to assemble, if you have never owned one, just snap in. Nice ratchet feature. I personally don't like the other kind that you have to slide to make fit those get loose over time. Plus if you have another hat you can swap the inside with this one. I don't see any problem with the one that comes with it is very comfortable. You will probably forget that it is on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Unlike any other hard hat I’ve used before
customer_reviews.text: This hard hat was surprising when I first got it. It’s made from a different type of plastic then what I’m normally used to. I was almost expecting it to be cheap and worthless because of this. However, this hard hat is extremely well built and very durable. It has protected me countless times and has still stood strong. The best things about it are it’s weight and netting. This hard hat is extremely light weight, and the netting is extremely comfortable. Very rarely does it pull on my hair, or cause any head discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Hunter I

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The product description says class C, E and G, which should all be stamped into the hat. It is only stamped Class C. Which means it is not rated for what I need it for. All these wrong product descriptions need to stop. Missed product return deadline because of the Covid crap.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. I've worn better
customer_reviews.text: The hard hat sat really high on my head campare to others. There is some ajustments u can make to lower it , but it just wasnt enough. Also the knob thats used to tighten the hat to size sits on a band that pivits up and down for some reason, but the worst thing about it for me is when im looking down while im working the hat rides down into my eyelids.. i think this hat would be fine for someone that just stands there, but its not working out for me.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Move on - my assembly didn't fit - also very thin material - NOT assembled
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black one. I tried to assemble it for 25 min and concluded that the head rest wasn't designed for the shell that I ordered. Putting tab A into slot B doesn't work (I believe) when it's not marked on the product. Also -- this is not very good plastic. It feels very McDonalds toy plastic and smells a bit. It was lower quality than I thought it would be. The interior top head rest is a piece of plastic and the sweat guards thin. But most of all - why would they not assemble it? How much labor would that take? This is one of those race to the bottom products. I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.author: iworkblue

customer_reviews.title: If a hardhat can be stylish, this one is.
customer_reviews.text: I am a former lawyer turned woodworker, and now learning large timber framing on the job on commercial projects. I thought this helmet was rather stylish, and it reminded me of the one Bill H. Macy wore as The Shoveler in the movie Mystery Men. Well, I got several compliments from my co-workers on the color and the subtle carbon-fiber look of this helmet. Who knew construction workers could be so fashion-forward?
customer_reviews.author: CWJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of complements
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that guys stop me all the time and ask about this hardhat. They seem to have a man-crush on it - LOL. They all ask if it is carbon fiber and I tell them no, but they still like it and want one. It took me a few days to realize that the part of the head strap with the adjusting knob was hinged, so remember to pull it down as you put the hardhat on. Otherwise the knob stays kind of buried and hard to get to. Once you hinge it downward on your head it is very easy to get to.
customer_reviews.author: 1KnightStan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: We have used this particular brand hardhat for many years and it continues to be a great choice for head protection. We wear them all day, and sometimes nights too :D . It fares well from use, and we have always had good long lasting use of them. Well, that is till it needs replaced due to age etc. The Amazon price point is superb, it saved us $$ off purchasing one locally. With a 1 day delivery too. If you like this model you can't go wrong with purchasing it here.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Far better than the cheepo hard hats. Attaching the headwear assembly to the helmet was a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars. I'm a noobie. so I had difficulty figuring our how to attach the head suspension assembly to the 4 insertion sockets located in the interior of the helmet. The Step 1 diagram (on the plastic bag) is not large or descriptive enough to show the correct orientation of the connectors, so I took off 1/2 star for the rating. Otherwise, I'm glad I purchased this full brim Ridgeline helmet. It's comfortable, has a good fit, and is substantial. The ratchet dial for adjust ti your head size dial works great. I feel this helmet is far and away a superior helmet to the basic 3M helmets you can purchase at Lowe's/Home Depot/Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon

customer_reviews.title: Vertical adjustment on the back rachet
customer_reviews.text: This is a little softer than i expected. I can see how this might not be able to withstand as much abuse as other hard hats. but overall i am not in a tough industry so i just need something to meet standards. Once i adjusted the hat to my head it was comfortable and light weight. the strap in the back also has a nice vertcal adjustment which fits different shapes of heads, not just sizes.
customer_reviews.author: jeffTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: These hats are NOT labeled for electrical work
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as meeting NSI/ISEA Z89.1 Class C, G or E. The seller repeats this claim in the comments. The ANSI standard requires that hats are labeled with the applicable type and applicable class. Class C is for conductive hats. Class E is for electrical work. These hats are labeled for TYPE 1, CLASS C ONLY.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I traded my work-supplied hard hat for this one... and I'm glad I did. This hard hat is incredibly comfortable and lightweight. I was worried about the black being too hot in the California sun, but it hasn't proven to be an issue. As others have said, it fits lower on my head than my other hard hat, which I appreciate! The only negative is that the (very comfortable) removable headband fabric has tiny holes in it that can cause an imprint of tiny bumps on your forehead. This is only a problem if you have to take your hard hat on and off. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Ureta

customer_reviews.title: Not a class E don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Paid for a class E and got a class C the lowest rated of hard hats... blatant false advertising
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration
customer_reviews.text: I just received my hard hat excited to finally have something I enjoy wearing and realized the hard hat is expired. Now it is nice and comfortable and seems to be a good design although I wish it had vents which I thought I ordered but I must not have. My only downside other then those two are that the suspension should not be fixed yes it is adjustable up and down but you should also be able to adjust the material. Very lightweight and nice feel besides front is rough but way better then my heavy MSA I just which it had adjustable material like the msa and a little better pad
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: False description! It’s a type 1 class C. No way is it a E or G.
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight and cool looking but It’s a type 1 class c and that’s it. Not E or G. Hopefully the company I work for approves it or else it’s going back. Some one can get really hurt if they wear a class C at a job where it is required to have a class E or G hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Meza

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At this price I wasn't expecting much. However, sometimes you can get something great at a better price. This hard hat is incredibly light, has a great and super durable pattern, and comes with a hinged suspension that will keep the hard hat from falling off even while holding your head upside down(I tried). The sweatband is comfortable and performs well and the hinge on the back has a gel-like foam pad where it rest on the back of your head. All in all, I highly recommend it for the comfort. I can't comment on it's impact resistance and I hope not to test it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Benson

customer_reviews.title: Was lookng for a good vented hard hat, will keep looking
customer_reviews.text: While it does have vents at the top, they do not seem to be doing an enough of an appropriate job in 'venting' arena when it comes to hard hats. Maybe it's because I'm bald and I sweat a lot, but was looking for a venting hard hat and I suppose the quest will need to continue. Compared to my non-venting hard hat it is much better, just trying to find a hard hat that will not just get saturated with my sweat each and every day.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T

customer_reviews.title: suspension straps not adjustable, not good for tall shaped heads
customer_reviews.text: If you have a t"taller" shaped head this fits horrible. it literally just sits on the top of your head because the suspension straps have no adjustments. There are minimal adjustments in the head band, but not near enough to fit a a taller shaped head. Other wise good quality, the rear adjustment crank works very well, and carbon look is great.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this hard hat and he doesn't give out praise easily!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparison shopping and this was best! Great hard hat for a great price. It's comfortable, lightweight, perfectly vented to keep his head cool, protective, durable, and the adjustable head strap thingee lets him tweak it for a perfect fit. This hard hat stays on even when a branch whacks him but is never too tight or constrictive. He loves it! So that's good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a ball cap style one, but I don’t mind the full brim. I’ve seen a few different people on jobsites with these hard hats, and I decided it was time for me to get one. They are comfortable and the ratchet is really sturdy. All hard hats are pretty much the same (unless you’re spending big bucks on a carbon fiber one). This one just looks a little cooler than most.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels comfortable but not as strong as it should be
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, it is lightweight but it's not a safety hard hat. The material is very thin, doesn't feel safe to protect your head from accidents. If you want something in your head that looks good this will do the job perfectly, but don't get anything hitting you or you will regret your entire life.
customer_reviews.author: Ismel

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: if you are in a hard hat area this fulfills the requirements. It is adjustable to head size and black allows for long term use on multiple job sites without looking grody over time. Also carbonite is a good material to shield the noggin. The flare allows for protection when stooping under the gantries where guys are still painting and spackeling.
customer_reviews.author: O.Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable hard hat I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable hard hat I have owned. I've been working on job sites for over 7 years and this is my favorite so far. The vents keepy head cooler and the product seems very well made and very durable. I'm sure there are more comfortable or better offerings out there but for under $30 I am not sure you can do any better then this one. I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: James e benson

customer_reviews.title: Husband absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Father's Day. He absolutely loves it! He tossed the hardhat his company gave him and says he'll never wear another brand of hard hat again. He said the inside suspension is more comfortable than any hard hat he's ever worn. Super light weight and durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and holds up
customer_reviews.text: I've knocked my hard hat around a lot, and am just generally abusive to it. (When I'm not wearing it) No real damage, just a few scratches in it. I also have people comment in how light it is, if anyone picks it up. Very comfy too. I've recommended it to several of my coworkers and they like theirs too.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: this thing is CRAZY comfortable and I have a big head I mean I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the same old 3M hardhat for a year now and wanted to get something new and not break the bank. this thing is CRAZY comfortable and I have a big head I mean I wear a XXL Motorcross helmet and this thing is amazing. Personally I don't notice the weight at all just like wearing a baseball cap to me. But then again I wear these things everyday for up to 8+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hard hat
customer_reviews.text: I put 5* on durability but that's just a guess. It feels durable to me. This is by far the best hard hat I've ever owned. I have long hair and haven't had an issue once. The triangle tighting piece is easy to grip with gloves on. The matte black looks amazing. I'm absolutely in love with this hard hat
customer_reviews.author: Damien C Kinchen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to fit the bill but have it less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be comfortable for now. It has not truly been tested for comfort or durability because I have had it for less than a week. This is the reason that it stands at 3 stars. It seems like it could be durable but you never know. Will update review in a few months to see where we are with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat!
customer_reviews.text: Hard hat is good quality, very light with a great finish. Read a few reviews where people said it sits to high on head. This hard hat fits me well, this is work, not a fashion show! Hard hats are designed to sit off your head to take a blow to protect you if needed. The 4 point ratchet system works great. I fit it to my head and was able to bend over without it falling off, like my old hard hat did. I would recommend this product. The vents in the top and on the back will allow air to flow and keep head cool.
customer_reviews.author: D Griffin

customer_reviews.title: The boss
customer_reviews.text: Wanna look like the harda$$ on any job site? Look no further. I’m often in and out of shipyards, to do inspections, and I’m always stopped by someone wanting to know where I got my lid. Oh yeah...it’s comfortable, safe, and blah blah blah too.
customer_reviews.author: Shea T. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this hard hat!!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on the fact that it looks like carbon fiber. I even had a coworker buy one he loved it so much. It is comfortable and I've had a metal pipe hit me on the hard had and it held up like it is supposed to. Id buy again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: After seeing several reviews complaining about its durability, I still went ahead and bought this one because I liked the way it looked and it had many positive reviews. It's lightweight! That being said, it's not as heavy duty as some might like, but we're all looking for a middle ground where affordable and safety meet and this hat fits right in. I've worn it for about a month now and it's already got noticeable scratches on the paint (That's just cosmetic, who cares?!) and makes it look better if anything. It fits comfortably and looks great! You'll get compliments right away! Overall, it's a nice hard hat that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: The Pyramex Ridgeline full brim hard hat is the awesomely comfortable. I am constantly visiting construction sites and wear a hard hat for most of my work day. This product is light weight, comfortable and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeD.

customer_reviews.title: Best ratcheting system !
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight. Looks awesome works awesome. I ordered mine vented and works great. Totally worth the price and the way it holds on to your head from a lower position it doesn’t give me headaches after prolonged use like others and holds on tight to your head even while bending over! Now they just need to make a reflective version with a head lamp attachment for night work and I’ll buy another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: DeVel 5150

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable hard hat that I've worn.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable has all the ratings needed for utility work. I hang upside down often for work and this doesn't fall off. The padding is great and easy to clean. I've also taken many blows from rocks which happens in deep excavations and suspension really dispersed the blow. Keeps color. Knocked one star because it doesn't have a thickened edge for milwaukee sharpies to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Joe the pipe layer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble NOT vented
customer_reviews.text: Sending it back. I spent 30 minutes trying to put this thing together and could not get one of the 4 headband clips to engage. It is Beyond me why it doesn't come FULLY assembled. This model does not have vents in the ridge. Apparently there is another model that does. It seams like a pretty good hat beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: George Z

customer_reviews.title: Does not include 4 point adjustable ratchet
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT include the 4 point adjustable ratchet. Only the hard hat shell is provided. Bad description.
customer_reviews.author: Sabotaged69

customer_reviews.title: Best in comfort, style, and cost
customer_reviews.text: Best hard hat I've ever had, and I've had a lot! Very lightweight, looks fantastic and the suspension system is most comfortable of any others. The best part is ratchet in back doesn't sit on back of skull but rather pulls down to almost upper neck, which prevents it from falling off when looking up and also doesn't hurt my head. U won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Dbo_421

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: I painted the inside a matte black to subdue light reflections along the inside of the brim and it looks sharp and functions very well.
customer_reviews.author: Yetimonster

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: Super light, almost feels like a toy. Suspension system 4pt is nice and comfortable. Soft sweat band on the front, cushy padding on the back. The ratchet swings to get a good grip on your noggin. The finish is delicate (it’s a hard hat I know) there were pretty good scuffs and scratches just from strapping a headlamp on it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P Tracy Jr

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Seems legit. I hit my head (20% power) with the blunt side of an axe while wearing this and it didn't hurt at all. Due to the inside straps it feels like someone is just forcing your head down hard with a towel or something.
customer_reviews.author: Isleofdoggos

customer_reviews.title: works and feels great
customer_reviews.text: it is comfortable and light weight but i feel like the durability would be lacking but thats just from how it feels (light, flimsy, flexing) but haven't been hit with anything yet so cant vouch for that... yet....
customer_reviews.author: demized empire

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, durable, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Weight is similar, if not identical to standard hdpe hats. Comfortable liner, and good/large adjustment range. Wears comfortably for extended periods, sits lower than my old hard hats, so not as likely to ping on moderately low hanging obstructions.
customer_reviews.author: OldTNbear

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding brain bucket
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my second one of these and I love them. These are lightweight and very durable and I do not treat them nicely. My only complaint is the padding on tension adjust start to rub off after about 6 months and will leave black mark on your head thats pain to rub off.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: 4 point harness uncomfortable for long periods,
customer_reviews.text: The six point add-on harness from pyramex does not fit their helmets. This would be a very decent helmet at a acceptable price if this were fixed. As received though, I'll need to purchase another helmet elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice hard hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice hard hat! Light and with a great suspension system. I am used to the ones the company gives out for free which are heavy and don't ever fit right/ This hat has soft suspension feel great and fits perfect. Nice looking also
customer_reviews.author: Fredrics1

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for product, 4 for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product is 5 stars, having to figure out how to assemble with horrible instructions is why I gave it 4. We probably spent 30 minutes trying to figure out how to put the straps on the inside of the helmet. The only instructions were bad pictures on the bag. Helmet fits and feels great, putting it together was a pain!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat.
customer_reviews.text: This hard hat is great, wore it to work and almost immediately the complements started. Looks great and keeps me safe when working with the urban forestry crew
customer_reviews.author: Melerofamily

customer_reviews.title: Very Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I went from a fiberglass shell to this because of the weight difference. What a difference, would never go back to the fiberglass shell. The harness has a swivel back strap where the adjustment is. I have never seen one like this so was suspicious, but have found the hat to be very comfortable. Would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great price & style hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good looking hard hat. I use it when I visit job sites on a weekly basis so I can’t speak on all day comfort but it’s definitey comfortable for me and adjusts easily. I get compliments on the hard hat all the time (black matte).
customer_reviews.author: Keven Melara

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We work 12hr shifts underground and it's holding up just fine. The suspension is a little weird with the hinge but I'd definitely buy it again. Had to drill a couple holes for a miners light bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Pothier

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Spent 20 minutes trying to assemble straps into hat. Seems to be at least 20 different ways, but have not yet figured out the correct way. I got no instructions or plastic bag with the hat. Asking wife to see if she can figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: TOM B.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love having a lighter weight hat. It does pinch longer hair ladies, but really only when you put it on. I've become accustomed to either loosening it first, or tilting the hat and hinged strap in order to avoid this. The only issue I really have, is that it came with an embossed company's emblem on it. Not sure if this was an error on the seller's part (I got the main part of someone's return?). Nowhere does it show any sort of logo on the item before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my husband in the Florida heat working outdoors. The design on the helmet is nice as well although at this point it’s covers with stickers as most do
customer_reviews.author: Eyerishgirl

customer_reviews.title: Hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my dad (because he does not know how to do it himself). He was very thrilled about the hard hat when it came in. Said it was light weight and it was ok for comfort but wasn't happy with the quality for the price of the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When you wear a hard hat all day, comfort matters as much a protection. This is a great hard hat, meets all safety requirements and is very comfortable. The headband design is one of the most comfortable I've every worn.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Gott

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight...brim offers good protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this to replace his work issue hard hat because the brim offered more protection from the sun. He is pleased with it so far. His only complaint is that the 6-point adjustable strap that was recommended to replace the 4-point strap the came with the hat did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable hard hat I’ve ever had. I wear this for 8-12 hours a day. The camo wrap last too. I’ve had this hard hat for 6 months and the one before for over a year. It doesn’t sit to far up on the head either so your not bumping your head on the ceiling. Great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this hard hat and put it in use so much. However, the extra large space/gap btwn the shell and the suspension renders an odd fit on me that wouldn't be able to fulfill it's purpose, regrettably.
customer_reviews.author: SY  Shoelover

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. For the price it is good quality and serves the purpose.I used it few times trimming the trees with my Gardner Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Vasudevan Rajasenan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little breaking in, but that's to be expected for any new hard hat. Comfortable to wear all day and so far has given me all the protection I've needed as I've weaved my way through scaffolding, hitting my helmet periodically. A good hard hat all in all.
customer_reviews.author: KCP

customer_reviews.title: The ratchet system is awesome and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The ratchet system is awesome and super comfortable. It does sit high on my head, even on the last setting. Looks cool too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly getting questions on job sites about where I got my hard hat, and I always answer with "Amazon baby! What can't you get?!". It meets all the safety requirements, so that is important, and it fits really nicely and doesn't irritate my head/hair, which is also important.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for sure
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a giant favor and get one of these. Toss that POS of a hard hat you’ve been wearing. I’m not going to wear trash on my head anymore for 50hrs a week
customer_reviews.author: Steven McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable hat
customer_reviews.text: This hard hat is great, it's comfortable while being durable, it's so comfortable that I've even forgotten that I was wearing this hat sometimes while on the job. I like the vents on this hat too, they help when working outside in the hot and humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: Leedo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a hard hat for occasional use this is the one! Don’t know if I would use it for dangerous environments on a daily basis, I would personally spend more money to protect my noggin haha but for occasional use in an environment that isn’t crazy dangerous this will work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kordel

customer_reviews.title: This hard hat that I purchased is fantastic. It’s durable and a must for on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This hard hat that I purchased is fantastic. It’s durable and a must for on the job construction site. It was shipped fast and It fits like a glove and I already got compliments from co-workers where I purchased this amazing hard hat. I will def have this a long time because it’s soooo well made
